about_the_game:
DAMA GALLERIA

In a short time, we were transported into something totally unique and new, something that allowed us to see and enjoy things differently.
New technologies have given us different ways of seeing things, and art has changed because of them and with them

DAMA is one among these new visions, when what is in front of us is no longer so tangible, we are transported into a new experience that tries to give what art conveys about us in the real world

DAMA is also a world where the sensations are totally different but also totally unique to create a hybrid of what we feel and experience through our own arbitrariness

DAMA is a digital space where the visitor can experience what the artists want to communicate with their works that encompass what we look, feel and perceive, leaving the viewer free to understand what they really want to tell us

Enter this micro-universe that is being updated with its new "Season 2222" which is bringing with it many new features and more artists from all over the world

Welcome to DAMAWORLD

Have Fun :)

If interested in some of the artworks write to dama.galleria@gmail.com or DM dama.galleria on Instragam

content_descriptors.notes:
The contents in the gallery are the result of a thought and a purely artistic review, do not want to hurt the sensibilities of people or minorities in any way.
The subjects depicted in these works of art are aware of and agree to such representation

legal_notice: all the works present in the gallery belong to the artists themselves and respect their copyright

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit windows
  • Processor: quad-core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Second Exhibition: "Damaworld" A digital art gallery that has become a little world, with a narrative about the environment itself and the artists in it
